about_the_game:
A sequel to the critically acclaimed "Tomboy Adventure!" is finally here!

Living in the middle of nowhere can have its benefits. Just you, the sea and ice cream from the vending machine up-hill. No one to bother you. Well, aside from this one girl that keeps showing up whether you want it or not...

Summer is getting close!

Features

Tomboy Adventure 2 is an interaction driven dating sim where through your choices you unsuccessfully try to romance your companion. Exploring the island unlocks new dialogue options, outfits and interactions, creating new opportunities for getting your feelings across. Perseverance is key!

  • Branching dialogue

  • Character editor

  • Headpatting

  • Explorable island

  • Day/night cycle

  • Dynamic weather

  • Advanced headpatting

  • Icecream!

  • Both VR and non-VR play is supported!

Summer is short so lets enjoy it!
